Title: American Pie Presents: Girls' Rules
Writer: Adam Herz (based on characters created by), Blayne Weaver, David H. Steinberg
Actors: Madison Pettis, Lizze Broadway, Natasha Behnam, Piper Curda
Plot: It's Senior year at East Great Falls. Annie, Kayla, Michelle, and Stephanie decide to harness their girl power and band together to get what they want their last year of high school.
